addTransportType(int).name: addTransportType(int)
addTransportType(int).documentation: Updates the transport types for this network capablities to include {@code transportType}.

removeTransportType(int).name: removeTransportType(int)
removeTransportType(int).documentation: Updates the transport types for this network capablities to remove {@code transportType}.

setLinkDownstreamBandwidthKbps(int).name: setLinkDownstreamBandwidthKbps(int)
setLinkDownstreamBandwidthKbps(int).documentation: Sets the LinkDownstreamBandwidthKbps of the NetworkCapabilities.

setNetworkSpecifier(android.net.NetworkS.name: setNetworkSpecifier(android.net.NetworkSpecifier)
setNetworkSpecifier(android.net.NetworkS.documentation:
Changes {@link NetworkSpecifier} for this network capabilities. Works only on Android O and
higher. For lower versions use {@link #setNetworkSpecifier(String)}

setNetworkSpecifier(java.lang.String).name: setNetworkSpecifier(java.lang.String)
setNetworkSpecifier(java.lang.String).documentation:
Changes {@link NetworkSpecifier} for this network capabilities. Works only on Android N_MR1 and
lower. For higher versions use {@link #setNetworkSpecifier(NetworkSpecifier)}

setTransportInfo(android.net.TransportIn.name: setTransportInfo(android.net.TransportInfo)
setTransportInfo(android.net.TransportIn.documentation: Sets the {@code transportInfo} of the NetworkCapabilities.

name: org.robolectric.shadows.ShadowNetworkCapabilities
documentation: Robolectic provides overrides for fetching and updating transport.
